title: Importing plants and fresh produce using the PEACH system

details.description: You must use the PEACH system (Procedure for Electronic Application for Certificates) to import certain plants, fruits and vegetables from non-EU countries
details.more_information: Some fruit and vegetables need to meet European standards to be imported into the UK or other EU countries. If you’re planning to import you can apply for a ‘Certificate of Conformity’ using the PEACH system.
details.introduction: You must use the PEACH system (Procedure for Electronic Application for Certificates) to import certain plants, fruits and vegetables from non-EU countries.
details.will_continue_on: the Defra (Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs) website
expectations: Available in England and Wales only
